data.comment: The match has started at Mandemakers Stadion.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Oussama Darfalou puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 45, Matus Bero with an assist there.
The second-half is underway at Mandemakers Stadion.
In the minute 55, Nicolas Olsak is replacing Richard van der Venne for the home team.
The away team have replaced Lois Openda with Thomas Buitink. This is the first substitution made today by Thomas Letsch.
Sylla Sow is replacing Finn Stokkers for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
In the minute 70, The home team replace James Efmorfidis with David Min.
Thomas Letsch (Vitesse) is making a second substitution, with Idrissa Toure replacing Oussama Darfalou.
Waalwijk make their fourth substitution with Morad el Haddouti replacing Luuk Wouters.
In the minute 82, Thierry Lutonda is on a sub for Lennerd Daneels for Waalwijk.
Thomas Letsch is making the team's third substitution at Mandemakers Stadion with Armando Broja replacing Thomas Bruns.
Waalwijk's Sylla Sow has been booked in Waalwijk.
In the minute 89, Thomas Buitink for Vitesse has been booked by Edwin Van de Graaf and receives a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
